scenario.title: 사이버크 부랑자의 삶
scenario.prologue: In the year 2090, the city of Neo-Tokyo is plagued by corruption and crime. You are a bounty hunter, seeking fortune and revenge in the dark alleys and neon-lit streets. Your life is one of constant danger, but also of freedom and possibility.

scenes.title: The Streets of Neo-Tokyo
scenes.content: You stand on the streets of Neo-Tokyo, surrounded by towering skyscrapers and holographic advertisements. You've received a tip about a valuable bounty hiding in the city. What do you do?

choices.text: Head to the local bar to gather information
Explore the city's underworld for leads

scenes.title: The Local Bar
scenes.content: You enter the local bar, a dimly lit establishment filled with shady characters. The bartender, a gruff but friendly man, greets you with a nod. What do you do?

choices.text: Order a drink and listen in on conversations

scenes.title: The Underworld
scenes.content: You navigate the dark alleys and cramped corridors of the underworld, searching for any sign of the bounty. Suddenly, you're confronted by a group of thugs. What do you do?

scenes.title: A Lead
scenes.content: You overhear a conversation that might lead you to the bounty. What do you do?

choices.text: Return to the streets to gather more information

scenes.title: A Suspicious Individual
scenes.content: You approach the suspicious-looking individual, who reveals themselves to be a valuable informant. What do you do?

scenes.title: Combat
scenes.content: You engage in combat with the thugs, emerging victorious but battered. You've earned a reputation as a formidable fighter, but at what cost?

scenes.title: Reasoning
scenes.content: You successfully reason with the thugs, earning their respect and a valuable alliance. Your reputation as a cunning negotiator spreads, opening up new opportunities.

scenes.title: The Bounty
scenes.content: You capture the bounty, earning a substantial reward and boosting your reputation as a skilled hunter. Your future looks bright, but the streets of Neo-Tokyo are always full of danger.

scenes.title: The Informant
scenes.content: You pay for the informant's information, leading you to a valuable lead. Your investment pays off, and you capture the bounty, but at a steep cost. Your reputation as a shrewd investor grows, and you look to the future with caution.
